name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Flaky and buttery homemade croissants filled with premium chocolate

name: Mini Donuts
description: Buttery, tender donuts are baked then tossed with cinnamon and sugar

name: Vanilla Vegan Softserve
description: Silky smooth soft-serve icecream in a sugar cone

name: Lemon Macaroon Tarts
description: A perfect handheld dessert made with sweet, light and chewy coconut macaroon tartlet shells filled with bright sweet-tart lemon curd topped with whipped cream

name: Strawberry + Nutella Crepes
description: Sweet and simple crepe topped with Nutella and fresh strawberries

name: Vegan Baklava
description: Layers of sweet filo and chopped nuts, all covered in a sweet syrup instead of honey

name: Hawaiian Meatballs
description: A combination of sweet and savoury flavours put together into delicious bite sized meatballs

name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: Delicious and crispy sweet potato fries served with a spicy aioli sauce

name: Pulled Pork Empanadas
description: Pulled pork gets a Cuban kick with these crispy empanadas

name: Carrot Hummus + carrots + cucumbers + crackers
description: Perfect simple on the go snack for warm temperatures

name: Fruit smoothies
description: These refreshing smoothies come in strawberry kiwi, blueberry banana, pineapple kale and mango citrus flavours

name: Pretzels with Beer Cheese
description: Soft pretzels sprinkled with flakey salt, served with a smoked gouda and cheddar beer sauce for dipping

name: Elotes
description: A classic mexican street food made with a fresh grilled cob of corn topped with spices, lime and Cotija cheese

name: Baked Churros
description: A baked twist on the fried sweet snack, served with a hot chocolate sauce

name: Tacos
description: Delicious tacos filled with your choice of pulled pork, beef barbacoa or chicken

name: Horchata
description: Refreshing drink made with rice and cinnamon, great for summer heat

name: Poblano Quesadilla with Homemade Salsa
description: Quesadillas made with a flour tortilla filled with poblano, panela and cotija cheeses. Served with a spicy chipotle salsa

name: Portabello + Jalapeno Queso Burger
description: A delicious burger with a patty loaded with bacon, grilled mushrooms, onions, Jalepeno peppers and the classic American cheese.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy chicken tenders made with chicken tenderloins covered in egg, breadcrumbs, parmasan cheese, dijon mustard, and seasoning all baked together to create Ben :O

name: Poutine
description: A wonderful and delicious concoction of fries, gravy and cheese curds

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Hot sandwich made with buttered and toasted bread and filled with a mix of American, havarti and gouda cheeses

name: Rubber Duck Debugging Ale
description: Toasty malt and sweet caramel up front finishing with a nutty flavour, medium creamy carbonation, and mild hop bitterness.

name: Keyboard Kolsch
description: With a light fruity aroma and a bright, crisp finish, this is the perfect summer session ale

name: SSH Saison
description: Hoppy, farmhouse saison with champagne like effervescence; flavors include ginger, spice, orange and toasted grain.

name: LAN Lager
description: The ample use of malt gives this beer a vinous and rich character with apple, melon, banana, and caramel flavours balanced with a dry bitterness and hints of oak, bark, nuts and pine needles

name: Password Protection Pilsner
description: A refreshing, pale golden pilsener with a clean taste perfectly balanced with hints of barley malt, subtle bottom fermenting yeast tones and mild hoppy bitterness.

name: Shaved Brussel Sprout Salad
description: The bright lemon, chewy, tart cranberries, and salty cheese are a simple, yet addictive combination. With just a few ingredients, this salad checks all the flavor boxes.

name: Potato Salad with Radish
description: This potato salad recipe is a fresh riff on that classic one with a lighter, creamy dressing and veggies for crunch

name: Sesame Soba Noodles
description: A light sesame-ginger dressing that perfectly coats the soba noodles with a mix of vibrant spring veggies

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Lean protein plus lots of vegetables equals a simple, nutritious meal with a delicious, light raspberry vinegar dressing.

name: Spicy Sesame Crusted Seared Thai Tuna and Zucchini Salad
description: Piquant, pan seared sesame crusted Ahi tuna served over a bed of crisp zucchini noodles loaded with fresh veggies, bright herbs, and finished with a smooth Asian flavored dressing

name: Creamy Mac and Cheese
description: Baked mac and cheese is a family favorite recipe and uses a combination of cheeses, layered in the dish as well as melted into a rich and creamy cheese sauce, for the ultimate in cheesy deliciousness.

name: Grilled Cheese
description: Classic and delicious combination of bread, butter and Cheddar cheese grilled to golden brown perfection

name: Cheese + Cracker + Olive + Salami Platter
description: Combination of various rotating soft and hard cheeses, crackers, olives and various cured meats for a great sharable snack

name: Grilled Halloumi
description: Grilled Halloumi cheese is a delicacy. Golden brown, crispy exterior. Soft, gooey interior, and a wonderfully savory flavor.

name: Berry Cheesecake
description: Crispy biscuit base topped with creamy cheesecake filling with a set berry sauce on top

name: Espresso
description: A freshly pulled double shot of seasonal espresso

name: Cappuccino
description: An 8oz drink, made with a double shot of espresso and silky steamed milk of your choice

name: Matcha Latte
description: An 8oz drink containing a shot of JagaSilk maccha and topped with silky steamed milk of your choice.

name: Pour Over Coffee
description: Delicious hand brewed coffee by the cup.

name: The Classic Hot Ones Hot Sauce
description: This peppy hot sauce might become your #1 once you have a taste of its sumptuous combination of earthy Chile de Arbol, sharp organic rice vinegar and fresh, organic garlic and turmeric.

name: The Last Dab Apollo Hit Ones Hot Sauce
description: The Last Dab: Apollo is the only sauce in the world made with the Apollo Pepper. This sauce is made from only The Apollo Pepper and very little vinegar. The pepper takes three forms in this sauce: fresh peppers, dried peppers, and distilled pepper oil

name: Homeboy's Fiery Chipotle Hot Ones Hot Sauce
description: The tongue tingling flavors of chipotle, pineapple and lime please the palate while the mix of ghost and habanero peppers make this sauce a scorcher

name: Rogue Trinidad Scorpion Sauce with Blood Oranges
description: High River Sauces' Rougue hot sauce is a sweet and spicy blend of Trinidad Scorpion peppers and blood oranges.

name: AKA Miso Hot Ones Hot Sauce
description: Blazing hot Ghost and Carolina Reaper peppers meet savoury Aka Miso to create the perfect umami bomb.

name: Dill Pickles
description: They're crisp, tangy, and refreshing, with an addictive garlic-dill flavor

name: Pickled Eggs with Beets
description: Brilliant red beet pickled eggs

name: Pickled Asparagus
description: A crisp-tender snack

name: Bread and Butter Pickles
description: These old-fashioned bread and butter pickles have a crisp texture and a balanced sweet and sour flavor

name: Kosher Pickles
description: This flavor profile made popular by New York's Jewish pickle makers, known for their natural salt-brined pickles heavily seasoned with dill and garlic
